Posts.Content: Nov 23, 2018 03:43PM diannemc1957 wrote: Hello I am new here and new to breast cancer... I had stage 1 with no lymph nodes involved.. I didn't have any chemo or radiation.. I was put on anastrozole and took it for a month and started to get really bad hot flashes and real moody and anxious.I called the doctor and he changed it to exemestane.. it all got worst so after two months I could not do it anymore...Now I am scared that the cancer will come back.. Had to go on zoloft for the depression...Has anyone decided not to take estrogen blockers? Are there anything else I could do??? I go back to doctor in a couple of weeks.

Posts.Content: Nov 23, 2018 04:28PM diannemc1957 wrote: The cancer was in one breast but had both removed on Aug 3rd...it was estrogen positive ...I did really good after surgery and was facing things good till I got on the medicine and I just fell apart....There are people who go through so much and I can't even handle a pill...!
